formalJobs.job_description: As a Java Spring Boot Backend Developer, I work with multiple private technologies that keep the code clean, secure and with the quality needed to keep our clients services running at the best of our capabilities. On a daily basis, I work with private Java components, a designer for APIs and other tools for coding and team management.

I work as a frontend developer using React for a company private application. I'm also in charge of small-medium changes in the company portal, using Laravel as a fullstack tool. I contribute to the team by gatering information and simplifying internal processes.

I was in charge of the maintenance of our clients landing pages, websites and the company portal and API. I worked with tools like WordPress, Instapage, CodeIgniter, Kommo CRM, ActiveCampaign, Zapier, FileZilla and MySQL.
As a teacher, I was responsible for planning the subject topics and I was in charge of a small group of kids between 10 - 14 years old. I taught them the basics of HTML, CSS and how the web works.
